short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert your current URL to localhost

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to convert the URL in your current tab to use http://localhost:$port instead of the current domain. Port is configurable in the options of the extension.
